Posts.Content:
Christie, 45, Michigan
dx at age 30 (left side) at age 32 (right side). Not hormone sensitive. Small lumps. Self detected.
lumpecomy and radiation, choose not to do chemo. Still doing great.
Mother had breast cancer at the exact same ages. Had mastectomy both times and radiation. Self detected.
Mother had a new lump in scar tissue a few years ago. Taking Tamoxifin. I was hormone sensitive.
Still doing great!
Posts.Title: ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
